name: .WWU File Extension
summary: Learn about .WWU files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: XML file that represents a "Work Unit" in Wwise, a complete audio authoring tool designed for sound designers and audio programmers; an example of a Work Unit is a search query which finds sound objects that match the parameters of the query.

content: WWU files may be referenced by Wwise Project (.WPROJ) files. The workgroup feature of Wwise allows Work Units to be accessible by everyone in a development team.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
